import React from 'react' import { Fragment } from 'react' import { useParams, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Comments from '../components/comments/Comments' const QuoteDetails = () => { const DUMMMY_QUOTES = [ {id:'q1' , author:'schad Botombe', text:'Learning react is fun!!' }, {id:'q2' , author:'fred legusta', text:'Learning react is fun!!' }, {id:'q3' , author:'tom hendricks', text:'Learning react is fun!!' }, ] const quote = DUMMMY_QUOTES.find const params = useParams() return (

Quote Details

{params.quoteId}

) } export default QuoteDetails
